name: The Old Gods
description:
Controls:

Arrows to move.

Z/X to action (and get past title).

Objective: Wait until the heat death of the universe!

(We ran out of time, so our goal of potion mixing and potion swilling for buffs and a tidy little combat system were not realised)

This game was made during the live development segments of our Galway Game Jam 18 live stream on twitch, by Alanna Kelly (code) and Darren Kearney (art, sound).

You can check out the twich channel here and have a look around for Galway Game Jam 18: https://twitch.tv/galwaygamejam
